# mainApp

**Type Property**

An app service object that corresponds to the main application as a login item.

## Declaration

```swift
class var mainApp: SMAppService { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this `SMAppService` to configure the main app to launch at login.

## Managing apps

- **agent(plistName:)**: Initializes an app service object with a launch agent with the property list name you provide.
- **daemon(plistName:)**: Initializes an app service object with a launch daemon with the property list name you provide.
- **loginItem(identifier:)**: Initializes an app service object for a login item corresponding to the bundle with the identifier you provide.
